results.description: Elise Christie has won her second European short track speed skating medal in as many days - this time 1,000m bronze.
results.shortTitle: Christie wins European 1,000m bronze
results.title: Elise Christie wins European 1,000m bronze a day after claiming short track skating silver

results.description: Britain's Elise Christie wins 1500m European silver on her solo racing comeback.
results.shortTitle: Christie wins European 1500m silver
results.title: Elise Christie: British short track skater wins European silver on solo skating comeback

results.description: Elise Christie says the upcoming European Speed Skating Championships are a 'step forward' towards Beijing 2022.
results.shortTitle: Europeans a 'step forward' for Christie
results.title: Elise Christie: British speed skater 'proud' to be at European Championships after 2018 to forget

results.description: British speed skater Elise Christie says she considered quitting the sport after the Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang.
results.shortTitle: How Christie bounced back from lowest point
results.title: Elise Christie: Speed skater considered quitting after Winter Olympics

results.description: Elise Christie will compete for the first time since the Winter Olympics at the short track speed skating World Cup this weekend.
results.shortTitle: Christie to return to track at World Cup
results.title: Elise Christie: Winter Olympian ready for World Cup return

results.description: Two-time Olympian Charlotte Gilmartin announces her retirement from short track speed skating.
results.shortTitle: Gilmartin announces retirement
results.title: Charlotte Gilmartin: Ex-Winter Olympian retires from short track speed skating

results.description: Great Britain short track skater Elise Christie reacts to messages of support on social media after she failed to win a medal in three attempts at the 2018 Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang.
results.shortTitle: Christie reacts to messages of support
results.title: Winter Olympics: Elise Christie reacts to messages of support

thumbnail.altText: Elise Christie reacts to a message

results.description: Elise Christie finally has something to celebrate as boyfriend Sandor Liu Shaolin wins the 5,000m short track relay gold in Pyeongchang.
results.shortTitle: Christie celebrates boyfriend's relay gold
results.title: Winter Olympics: Elise Christie celebrates Sandor Liu Shaolin's relay gold

results.description: Skater Elise Christie says inspiring people in Britain is "as good as any medal" she could have won at the Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang.
results.shortTitle: Inspiring people 'as good as any medal' - Christie
results.title: Winter Olympics: Elise Christie says inspiring people is 'as good as any medal'

results.description: Britain's Elise Christie says her Winter Olympic failures do not "define" her and she will come back stronger at the next Games in Beijing.
results.shortTitle: Olympic failures don't define me - Christie
results.title: Elise Christie says Winter Olympic failures will not 'define' her

results.description: Shaolin Sandor Liu, the boyfriend of Great Britain's Elise Christie, helps Hungary win their first ever Winter Olympic gold medal.
results.shortTitle: Christie's boyfriend wins gold
results.title: Winter Olympics: Shaolin Sandor Liu, boyfriend of Elise Christie, helps Hungary to first gold

results.description: Suzanne Schulting of the Netherlands wins gold in the women's short track skating 1,000m final at the Winter Olympics.

results.title: Winter Olympics: Netherlands' Suzanne Schulting wins 1,000m short track gold

results.description: Watch a dramatic women's 1,000m short track final as the two South Korean skaters crash into each other and Suzanne Schulting wins gold for the Netherlands.
results.shortTitle: Schulting wins gold as South Koreans crash out
results.title: Winter Olympics: South Koreans crash as Schulting wins 1,000m short track gold

results.description: China's Wu Dajing wins men's 500m short track gold in a world record time of 39.58 seconds at the Winter Olympics.
results.shortTitle: Short-track gold and world record for Wu Dajing
results.title: Winter Olympics: Wu Dajing wins men's 500m short track speed skating gold

results.description: China's Wu Dajing breaks his own world record to win gold in the men's 500m short track skating at the Winter Olympics.
results.shortTitle: Wu breaks own world record to win gold
results.title: Winter Olympics: Wu Dajing wins 500m short track skating for China's first gold

results.description: After speed skater Elise Christie crashed out of the Winter Olympics, those closest to her relive the emotions they went through.
results.shortTitle: 'You feel like you need to protect Elise'
results.title: Winter Olympics: Why Elise Christie tugs at nation's heartstrings

results.description: Watch highlights as South Korea defend their Olympic women's short-track 3,000-metre relay title in dramatic fashion.

results.description: Great Britain's Elise Christie says she does not understand the disqualification that ended her Winter Olympics in Pyeongchang, but promises to return for Beijing in four years' time.
